dev_mode.info: If the FVTM Dev Mode (generally more logging) should be enabled.

vehicle_update_range.info: Range in which Vehicle Update Packets will be sent.

vehicles_need_fuel.info: If vehicles need Fuel (in survival mode) to function.

vehicle_drop_contents.info: If vehicles should drop their inventory contents upon being removed.

road_tool_for_all.info: When not using a Forge PermissionsAPI compatible permission manager, to allow any player to use the Road Placing Tool.

load_packs_from_mods.info: If true, FVTM will search for packs in the /mods/ folder.

dismount_on_logout.info: If players should automatically dismount vehicles on log out (leaving server).

traffic_sign_libraries.info: List of External Traffic Sign Libraries. Separate the ID from the URL using a semicolon.

render_out_of_view.info: If vehicles should be rendered out of default view.

render_vehicle_models_as_items.info: If the Vehicle's model should be rendered as Item. Could cause lags.

render_block_models_as_items.info: If the (non-vanilla) Block models should be rendered as Item.

disable_light_beams.info: If light beam rendering should be disabled.

render_vehicles_separately.info: If vehicles should be rendered separately new a new render pass. Allows for higher view distance.

disable_particles.info: If FVTM particles (particle system) should be disabled.

blinker_interval.info: Blinker/Turn Signal toggle interval, in milliseconds.

sync_rate.info: Entity sync rate in ticks. Lesser value means higher sync AND higher bandwidth. Higher value means slower sync and less bandwidth.

disable.info: If FVTM rail system should be disabled.

unload_interval.info: Interval (milliseconds) in which it is checked for trains/rails to be unloaded.

generation_segmentator.info: Segmentator divider for rail generator, valid are 16, 8, 4, 2 or 1.

max_length.info: Max total vector length of new placed rail tracks.

disable.info: If FVTM road system should be disabled.

max_length.info: Max total vector length of new placed roads.

undo_cache_size.info: How many roads should be remembered in the undo cache. Set '0' to disable the undo cache.

undo_cache_cleartime.info: After how many minutes the undo cache of a player should reset. Useful if your players have unstable connection. Set to '0' for instant deletion.

disable.info: If FVTM wire system should be disabled.

generation_segmentator.info: Segmentator divider for wire generator, valid are 16, 8, 4, 2 or 1.

max_length.info: Max total vector length of new placed wires.
